name: ExportOptionsAutoCAD
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document to AutoCAD formats &#40;.dwg or .dxf)

property.name: exportFileFormat
property.shortdesc: Which format to export the file as.

property.name: version
property.shortdesc: Release of AutoCAD to export to.

property.name: unitScaleRatio
property.shortdesc: Ratio by which to scale the output.

property.name: colors
property.shortdesc: Number of colors to export into the AutoCAD file.

property.name: rasterFormat
property.shortdesc: Raster format in which to export raster art.

property.name: exportOption
property.shortdesc: Whether to preserve appearance or editability during export.

property.name: convertTextToOutlines
property.shortdesc: Whether to convert text to outlines.

property.name: scaleLineweights
property.shortdesc: Whether to scale lineweights by the same amount as rest of the drawing.
